items.name: Classic Cheeseburger
items.description: Beef patty, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and special sauce.

items.description: Plant-based patty with lettuce, tomato, and vegan mayo.

items.description: Crispy chicken patty with spicy mayo, lettuce, and jalapeños.

items.description: Beef patty, BBQ sauce, bacon, onion rings, and cheddar cheese.

items.name: Mushroom Swiss Burger
items.description: Juicy beef patty with sautéed mushrooms, Swiss cheese, and garlic aioli.

items.description: Golden crispy fries with sea salt.

items.description: Seasoned spiral-cut fries.

items.description: Crispy fried mozzarella with marinara sauce.

items.name: Soft Drink
items.description: Choose from a variety of sodas.

items.name: Iced Tea

items.description: Blended fruit smoothie available in mango, berry, or banana.

items.description: Freshly brewed coffee.
